title: Seven Days
cast_members: Lillian Rich|Creighton Hale|Lilyan Tashman|Mabel Julienne Scott|William Austin|Hallam Cooley|Rosa Gore|Tom Wilson|Eddie Gribbon|Charles Clary
adaptation_notes: Also based on the play of the same name by Rinehart and Avery Hopwood. According to Jan Cohn, the play was based on Rinehart's novel 'When a Man Marries' (1910), which was itself based on the novella 'Seven Days,' which ran in Lippincott's in December 1908 (Cohn 1980, p. 48).
